Cottage Health is offering COVID-19 vaccine at multiple locations based on available vaccine supply. 
Appointments are required. Everyone age 16+ is now eligible to receive vaccine. Minors age 16 or 17 may receive only Pfizer vaccine and must be accompanied by a parent/guardian.
